body.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html><head><meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type"><meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" name="viewport"><meta content="IE=edge" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"><meta name="editor" content="DRAGANDDROP"><meta name="version" content="2.0.1"><style id="p3-base-style">
/* @id fixes */
/* @section global */
body {
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
	width: 100% !important;
	-webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
	-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
}
/* @section text */
p {
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
}
/* @section tables */
table {
	mso-table-lspace: 0px;
	mso-table-rspace: 0px;
	margin: 0px auto !important;
}
/* @section table-content */
table td {
	padding: 0px;
	border-collapse: separate;
}
/* @section images */
img {
	outline: none;
	text-decoration: none;
	border: none;
}

/* @id responsive */
/* @section sm-container */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.container,
	.container-padding {
		width: 100% !important;
	}
}
/* @section sm-col */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.block-column-column {
		width: 100% !important;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		display: block;
	}
}
/* @section sm-img */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.block-column-column img {
		max-width: 100% !important;
		width: auto !important;
		height: auto !important;
	}
}
/* @section sm-hide */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.hide {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
</style><style id="p3-global-style">
/* @id body */
/* @section background */
body,
.block-background-background {
	background-color: #000000;
	background-image: none;
}
/* @section text */
.block-content-text td,
.block-content-text td > p,
.unsubscribe {
	font-size: 15px;
	color: #000001;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	line-height: 150%;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-style: normal;
	text-decoration: none;
	text-align: left;
}

/* @id h1 */
/* @section text */
h1 {
	font-size: 26px;
	color: #000001;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	line-height: normal;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-style: normal;
	text-decoration: none;
	margin-top: 0px;
	margin-right: 0px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	margin-left: 0px;
}

/* @id h2 */
/* @section text */
h2 {
	font-size: 15px;
	color: #ffffff;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	line-height: normal;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-style: normal;
	text-decoration: none;
	margin-top: 0px;
	margin-right: 0px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	margin-left: 0px;
}

/* @id h3 */
/* @section text */
h3 {
	font-size: 15px;
	color: #000001;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	line-height: normal;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-style: normal;
	text-decoration: none;
	margin-top: 0px;
	margin-right: 0px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	margin-left: 0px;
}

/* @id links */
/* @section text */
a,
h1 a,
h2 a,
h3 a,
h4 a,
h5 a,
h6 a {
	color: #E44469;
	background-color: none;
	border: none;
	text-decoration: none;
	font-style: normal;
	font-weight: normal;
	word-wrap: break-word;
}
</style><style id="p3-global-block-style">
/* @id data-block-background */
/* @section default */
.block-background {
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
	width: 100%;
	line-height: 100%;
}

/* @id data-block-panel */
/* @section border */
.block-panel-full-width > td,
.block-panel-coloured .container > tbody > tr > td,
.block-panel-clear .container > tbody > tr > td,
.block-panel-grid .block-column-column {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-panel-full-width > td,
.block-panel-coloured .container > tbody > tr > td,
.block-panel-clear .container > tbody > tr > td,
.block-panel-grid .block-column-column {
	padding-top: 10px;
	padding-right: 10px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
	padding-left: 10px;
}
/* @section width */
.block-panel .container {
	width: 600px;
}
/* @section background */
.block-panel-full-width > td,
.block-panel-coloured .container,
.block-panel-grid .block-column-column {
	background-color: #ffffff;
}
/* @section background-image */
.block-panel-full-width > td,
.block-panel-coloured .container {
	background-image: none;
	background-position: center;
	background-repeat: repeat;
}
/* @section hide-on-mobile */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-panel {
		/* display */
	}
}

/* @id data-block-panel="grid" */
/* @section media-padding-column */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-panel-grid .block-column-padding {
		display: block !important;
		width: 100% !important;
	}
}

/* @id data-block-row */
/* @section border */
.block-row-row .container-padding,
.block-row-slot .container-padding {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-row-row .container-padding,
.block-row-slot .container-padding {
	padding-left: 0px;
	padding-right: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 0px;
	padding-top: 0px;
}
/* @section background */
.block-row-row .container-padding,
.block-row-slot .container-padding {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section hide-on-mobile */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-row {
		/* display */
	}
}

/* @id data-block-column="column" */
/* @section border */
.block-column-column {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-column-column {
	padding-top: 10px;
	padding-right: 10px;
	padding-bottom: 0px;
	padding-left: 10px;
}
/* @section background */
.block-column-column {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section align */
.block-column-column {
	vertical-align: top;
}
/* @section content */
.block-column-column {
	font-weight: normal;
}
/* @section hide-on-mobile */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-column {
		/* display */
	}
}

/* @id data-block-column="padding" */
/* @section default */
.block-column-padding {
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	font-size: 1px;
	line-height: 1;
}
/* @section media */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-column-padding {
		display: none !important;
	}
}

/* @id data-block-content="text" */
/* @section background */
.block-content-text > td {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section border */
.block-content-text > td {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-content-text > td {
	padding-top: 0px;
	padding-right: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
	padding-left: 0px;
}

/* @id data-block-content="divider" */
/* @section background */
.block-content-divider {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section border */
.block-content-divider > td {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-content-divider > td {
	padding-top: 0px;
	padding-right: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
	padding-left: 0px;
}
/* @section content-height */
.block-content-divider .divider-content {
	font-size: 1px;
	line-height: 1;
	height: 1px;
}
/* @section helper-height */
.block-content-divider .divider-helper {
	font-size: 1px;
	line-height: 1;
}
/* @section content */
.block-content-divider .divider-content {
	border-bottom-width: 1px;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	padding-top: 10px;
}
/* @section helper */
.block-content-divider .divider-helper {
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}

/* @id data-block-content="spacer" */
/* @section background */
.block-content-spacer {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section border */
.block-content-spacer > td {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-content-spacer > td {
	padding-top: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
/* @section content */
.block-content-spacer .spacer-content {
	font-size: 1px;
	line-height: 1;
	height: 1px;
	padding-top: 10px;
}
/* @section helper */
.block-content-divider .divider-helper {
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}

/* @id data-block-content="button" */
/* @section background */
.block-content-button table td {
	background-color: #505050;
}
/* @section border */
.block-content-button table td {
	border-top-width: 1px;
	border-right-width: 1px;
	border-bottom-width: 1px;
	border-left-width: 1px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #353535;
	border-right-color: #353535;
	border-bottom-color: #353535;
	border-left-color: #353535;
	border-top-left-radius: 5px;
	border-top-right-radius: 5px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
}
/* @section text */
.block-content-button table td,
.block-content-button table td > a,
.block-content-button table td > span {
	color: #FFFFFE;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-style: normal;
	line-height: normal;
	text-decoration: none;
	text-align: center;
	display: block;
}
/* @section padding-extra */
.block-content-button > td {
	padding-top: 0px;
	padding-left: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
	padding-right: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-content-button table td {
	padding-top: 10px;
	padding-right: 10px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
	padding-left: 10px;
}

/* @id data-block-content="preview-text" */
/* @section mobile */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-content-preview-text {
		display: block;
	}
}

/* @id data-block-content="image" */
/* @section background */
.block-content-image > td {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section border */
.block-content-image > td {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-content-image > td {
	padding-top: 0px;
	padding-right: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
	padding-left: 0px;
}
/* @section align */
.block-content-image td {
	text-align: center;
}
/* @section link */
.block-content-image > td > a {
	display: block;
	outline: none;
	border: none;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* @id data-block-content="image-placeholder" */
/* @section style */
.block-content-image-placeholder td {
	max-width: 100%;
	background-image: url('https://www.uploadlibrary.com/uploadlibrary/v8/v1.1.0/editor/placeholder-icons/placeholder-image-icon.png');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-position: center;
	background-color: #101d29;
	width: 100%;
	padding-top: 50%;
	padding-left: 0px;
	padding-right: 0px;
	padding-bottom: 0px;
}

/* @id data-block-content="placeholder" */
/* @section placeholder */
.block-content-placeholder td {
	height: 80px;
	border-width: 1px;
	border-style: solid;
	border-color: #dfe2e6;
	background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 14px;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	transition: color 0.1s ease-in-out;
}
/* @section hover */
.block-content-placeholder.block-dragged-on td {
	color: #3c9e9e;
}

/* @id data-block-content="social" */
/* @section background */
.block-content-social > td,
.block-content-social-placeholder > td {
	background-color: transparent;
}
/* @section border */
.block-content-social > td,
.block-content-social-placeholder > td {
	border-top-width: 0px;
	border-right-width: 0px;
	border-bottom-width: 0px;
	border-left-width: 0px;
	border-top-style: solid;
	border-right-style: solid;
	border-bottom-style: solid;
	border-left-style: solid;
	border-top-color: #000000;
	border-right-color: #000000;
	border-bottom-color: #000000;
	border-left-color: #000000;
	border-top-left-radius: 0px;
	border-top-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
}
/* @section padding */
.block-content-social > td,
.block-content-social-placeholder > td {
	padding-top: 10px;
	padding-right: 10px;
	padding-bottom: 0px;
	padding-left: 10px;
}
/* @section style */
.block-content-social td,
.block-content-social-placeholder td {
	max-width: 100%;
	width: 100%;
	line-height: 1;
}
/* @section icons */
.block-content-social td > a,
.block-content-social-placeholder td > a {
	vertical-align: top;
	outline: none;
	border: none;
	text-decoration: none;
}
/* @section media */
@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.block-content-social td,
	.block-content-social-placeholder td {
		line-height: 50px !important;
	}
}
/* @section images */
@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.block-content-social td a img,
	.block-content-social-placeholder td a img {
		width: 40px !important;
		height: 40px !important;
	}
}

/* @id data-block-content */
/* @section hide-on-mobile */
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
	.block-content {
		/* display */
	}
}
</style><style id="p3-block-style">
/* @id block-564700 */

/* @section padding */
.block-panel-full-width#block-564700 > td,
.block-panel-coloured#block-564700 .container > tbody > tr > td,

	border-top-color: #E44469;

	border-bottom-color: #E44469;

/* @section text */
